Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http

Class PriorityAwareHTTPConnection

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Connection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.LineBasedConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.HTTPConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.PriorityAwareHTTPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelHandler, H2FrameHandler
public class PriorityAwareHTTPConnection extends HTTPConnection
HTTP connection with HTTP/2 stream priority optimization.

This enhanced HTTP connection extends HTTPConnection with sophisticated stream priority processing:

  • Maintains RFC 7540 compliant priority dependency trees
  • Schedules stream processing based on priority and fairness
  • Allocates bandwidth proportionally to stream weights
  • Prevents starvation of low-priority streams
  • Tracks resource usage for optimization
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Method Details

    • headersFrameReceived

      public void headersFrameReceived(int streamId, boolean endStream, boolean endHeaders, int streamDependency, boolean exclusive, int weight, ByteBuffer headerBlockFragment)
      Description copied from interface: H2FrameHandler
      Called when a HEADERS frame is received.
      Specified by:
      headersFrameReceived in interface H2FrameHandler
      Overrides:
      headersFrameReceived in class HTTPConnection
      Parameters:
      streamId - the stream identifier
      endStream - true if this is the last frame for the stream
      endHeaders - true if this completes the header block
      streamDependency - the stream dependency (0 if no priority)
      exclusive - true for exclusive stream dependency
      weight - the priority weight (1-256, only valid if streamDependency > 0)
      headerBlockFragment - the HPACK-encoded header block (a slice)

    • priorityFrameReceived

      public void priorityFrameReceived(int streamId, int streamDependency, boolean exclusive, int weight)
      Description copied from interface: H2FrameHandler
      Called when a PRIORITY frame is received.
      Specified by:
      priorityFrameReceived in interface H2FrameHandler
      Overrides:
      priorityFrameReceived in class HTTPConnection
      Parameters:
      streamId - the stream identifier
      streamDependency - the stream this one depends on
      exclusive - true for exclusive dependency
      weight - the priority weight (1-256)

    • getPriorityOrderedStreams

      protected List<Integer> getPriorityOrderedStreams()
      Gets priority-ordered streams for processing. This method integrates with the connection's stream processing to provide priority-based scheduling.
      Returns:
      streams ordered by priority (highest first)

    • scheduleNextStream

      protected int scheduleNextStream()
      Schedules the next stream for processing based on priority and fairness.
      Returns:
      stream ID to process next, or -1 if no streams ready

    • recordStreamProcessing

      protected void recordStreamProcessing(int streamId, long bytesProcessed, long processingTimeMs)
      Records stream processing completion for scheduler optimization.
      Parameters:
      streamId - the processed stream
      bytesProcessed - number of bytes processed
      processingTimeMs - processing time in milliseconds

    • cleanupAllStreams

      protected void cleanupAllStreams()
      Description copied from class: HTTPConnection
      Immediately cleanup all streams when the connection is closing. This prevents memory leaks on connection termination and ensures telemetry spans are properly ended.
      Overrides:
      cleanupAllStreams in class HTTPConnection
